inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: signed the informed consent before liver biopsy

inclusion.criterion: no interferon or Nucleoside analogue treatment
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no history use of interferon or Nucleoside analogue treatment

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of alcoholic liver disease, bleeding from esophageal varices, hemochromatosis, autoimmune hepatitis, or metabolic liver disease

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of history of liver transplantation

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no history of medical condition that requires concurrent use of systemic prednisolone or other immunosuppressive agent

notes: 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV. On IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
